## IndexMatches type

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
type IndexMatches<
  Head extends readonly unknown[],
  Tail extends readonly unknown[],
  Index extends number
> = Head['length'] extends Index
  ? true
  : `-${Tail['length']}` extends `${Index}`
  ? true
  : false
```
